# Unit 1: Introduction

## Subjects
Fundamental areas covered:
* Data Formats.
* Unstructured, semi-structured and structured data.
* Splunk parsing.
* Bits, bytes, numbers and characters.
* Encoding and Compression.
* Magic Numbers.
